name: Lassi Lips Staining Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lip Oil
about: What it is: A smooth staining lip oil that goes on glossy, leaving a perfectly pigmented stain that lasts with one swipe and wont feather, flake, or transfer.Formulation Type: Lip Gloss & Lip Stain..Benefits: Moisturizing, Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients: - Mango Seed Oil: Moisturizing and nourishing..- Coconut Oil: Moisturizing..- Vitamin E: Antioxidant...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: A flake-free, feather-free formula that glides on with a moisturizing glossy slip designed for maximum comfort that dries down with staining power that lasts with a single swipe or as you layer it on throughout the day without transferring. Always vegan and cruelty free...Clean.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Mango Seed Oil: Moisturizing and nourishing. .-Coconut Oil: Moisturizing. .-Vitamin E: Antioxidant...Water (Aqua) (Eau), Diphenyl Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2,.Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Sorbitan.Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Octyldodecanol, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cocos Nucifera.(Coconut) Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Squalane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl.Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer,.Ammonium Polyacrylate, Ceteareth-20, Aluminum Hydroxide, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate,.Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red.33 (CI 17200), Red 28 (CI 45410), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start by using the tip of the applicator to define your cupids bow..-Starting in the center, glide evenly across lips to distribute a thin layer of product..-Leave with a thin coat or build up for a glossier finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice formula, it has very good staying power through a day of eating and drinking. Color is pretty true to the photos! Felt good on the lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this! I got it a week or 2 ago and I've used it almost every day, and it doesn't dry out. it also doesn't fade super easy and works really well if you're going out to eat!

reviews.review_title: Be careful for the lid malfunction causing a mess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 3-4 stars for product itself, I like the color but it wears off very patchy and for a stain doesnt last as long as it should. But ZERO stars for packaging. I opened this today and it literally poured out. I guess the stopper thingie came out with the wand? And thank goodness I had just turned when I opened this because it spilled onto my floor (stained my rug, but its older so Im not super mad about that - still sucks tho) and not my clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to give this lip stain a try since I want something that will withstand eating and drinking. Unfortunately it's not as pigmented as the product photos show, but the staying power is decent. I also noticed like a previous review mentioned, that the product leaks inside the tube, which is pretty annoying. I won't return it but I probably wouldn't get it again unless something changes about the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely product!  Nice glossiness when first applied and stains my lips a nice shade.  Wish the color was a bit more intense like the photos online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this product for a while now and I love Kulfi products. The color pay off and the stain is beautiful. But the packaging is terrible it gets everywhere and does not close properly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip stain so much. The color and formula are lovely but the packaging but the packaging is awful and that why Im giving it 2 stars. I leave it on my vanity upright and it still leaks product just sitting there. Im sad that I cant travel with this or take it with me out the house. I would be so sad if it leaked in my bag. I wont repurchase unless the packaging gets fixed and honestly Im considering returning it since its so much money to spend to have it leak

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this lip stain so much. doesn't budge! you can go out to eat and not worry about your lip color coming off. got some of my friends this for Christmas because I loved it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I got this product, I knew it was a lip stain but I didn't expect it to be what it is. When I first put it on my first thought was Oh! I wasn't expecting that. It's a very soft and smooth oil that gets darker as it dries. The color is so beautiful and delicate. TIP: Be careful when applying because it literally stains! Don't overline or underline your lips when applying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stain is great! Feels hydrating upon applying, the shine fades nicely, and stain is long-lasting! I had an allergic reaction (not sure to what), so I had to return.

reviews.review_title: Great at first, but not after a few weeks :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this consistently for almost a month and for a while it was a must-have product for me, but after a couple weeks it started to get this sour acidic smell. The colour payoff is still beautiful but the smell is rancid and Im not sure what I did to make it smell this way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this. I love how it's unscented and I love the applicator. It's easy to apply and isn't sticky at all. The stain it leaves behind lasts FOREVER, I usually don't need to reapply at all, I just used a clear balm or gloss.  I can't wait to try the other shades!

reviews.review_title: Must-have. One of best stain formulas ever.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stain lasted through my son's entire field trip, lunch, and the rest of my day. Plus, this didn't dry my lips out like with some others I've tried. And you can wear a gloss on top without worrying that it will ruin the stain. Wish I could give it ten stars. Phenomenal!

reviews.review_title: The perfect lipstain thats also comfortable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip stain ever! It feels so nice upon application and leaves a lovely color behind after the oil wears away. The rose color is the perfect blush on my lips I may have to try a few other colors as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Only u201cissueu201d ive faced is that it does settle into fine lines once it fully dries down. But I feel like that could be fixed with lip balm on top so I didnt care too much! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: super comfy lip oil and leaves a nice consistent, non-patchy stain. I only have tamarind and like it. Staying power is pretty good, expect to re apply after eating or drinking of you want the moisture in addition to the stain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful formula that stains very well and wears down beautifully. It's comfortable on the lips and the colors are all amazing. Rose is the perfect neutral, natural shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Both the shine and stain are gone by lunch time, and it could be the fact I chose the lightest shade, but I bought this product because of all the reviews about its longevity. As a person with very pale lips, I need something that wont rub off or fade, and I was really disappointed in this. It does feel nice on application, however, has a great component (wand, lightweight texture, fragrance free, not sticky at all).  Perhaps the worst thing about this formula is how dry it makes your lips (the same tightness you feel from one of the old school liquid lipsticks). It makes me lick my lips constantly as if I used chapstick. Im in a lot of meetings during the day and want my makeup to be very low maintenance once on, but the experience has actually distracted me enough to want to write this review. Hope it helps someone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lip oils i have caramel and just got first sari (i added a picture of this one). they're so beautiful and comfortable to wear. i also love the lip stains they leave !!!

reviews.review_title: The Lip Product Ive Been Waiting For

reviews.review_title: Nice colors but not long lasting!!

reviews.review_text: I love this color on my lips. It is hydrating and feels nice on the lips. But it is not long lasting for the fact that it is a stain and it should be lasting well.

Love this lip stain! And the deep raspberry color is perfect for fall! I recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

I'm not sure if I just got a bad batch of multiple products or if other people are okay with applying a product every 45 minutes, formula goes on weird too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light and glossy with a lasting stain. Image shown several hours after application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good. Exactly what you want in a lip product. Easy application it goes on evenly the colour carmel is gorgeous and it feels glossy and hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVEEE this lip oil more than words could ever describe. It makes my lips look super juicy when first applied and fades to the most gorgeous supple lip! It also doesnt dry my lips out like other lip oils ive tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating and love the colour/stain. Prefer this to the Rare Beauty Lip Oils.

reviews.review_title: Great color/stain, poor packaging, very drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Black Cherry looks exactly like the first product photo on me when I apply it, and I thought this was my HG stain at first.  Initial application has a nice shine to it that isn't wet-glossy, which of course mattes down as it absorbs.  Pros: - With a couple of applications, I get a lovely lasting color!  - No scent (SO hard to find this), tastes slightly bitter if you get a glob of it but that's not unexpected - Glides on easily/nice texture for spreading - Even color coverage  Cons: - Extremely drying on my lips, doesn't act like an oil for me at all - Sometimes I get little black flecks spread on my lips along with the product.  It's not just dry skin and the product is brand new so it isn't old and dehydrated in the tube.  No fun looking in the mirror and seeing this mess unexpectedly.  I don't know what's happening in the tube for this to occur. - The stopper of the tube (that removes excess product from the wand) isn't secured to the main tube at all.  It slides up and down and product constantly leaks through the crack, getting all over the wand and threads.  I clean this thing off constantly, losing a ton of product in the process.  One morning the stopper popped out completely along with the wand and I had to jam it back in.  Not ok at this price point and NOT ok for a dark product that stains!  I love the color and staining effect but the cons are making me move on and explore other options.  I hope they revisit this formula and packaging to address the black flecks and leaking because it has a lot of promise!

reviews.review_title: The tip of the applicator broke off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is good, however this applicator broke off in the tube. It was working completely fine and then suddenly it broke. I have seen other reviews with the same issue, hopefully it is fixed soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applied before I went to a music festival and it stayed on all day!! Its perfect!!

reviews.review_title: Packaging flaw: foam tip lip applicator MIA?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this lip oil (a little bday prezzy for myself), but it looks like the foam tip applicator fell off into the tube itself! Theres no easy way to retrieve it or access the lip oil. Very bummed I didnt even get to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own every lip stain ever made and not one of them stays on longer than an hour, at least not in the lighter shades.  This lip stain/ oil hybrid actually stays on most of the day.  I would like to see some lighter shades though.  The pink nude is a lot darker than the photos. If you put it on and do not press your lips together- just let it dry it will leave a stain.  I can even apply certain glosses on top without it coming off any faster.  It applies smooth and wears away nicely.  It doesnt settle in lines or dry patches so its mature lip friendly.  The pink nude is more of a dark cherry leaning red on my pale skin but its beautiful and it looks lovely on the cheeks too!  Hands down the best lip stain ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is...fine. I love how light and moisturizing it feels on my lips, and it leaves a nice, saturated stain. But this is one where the color will vary wildly depending on your skin & lips!  Caramel went on as a light brown (brown-brown on me, not peachy brown) gloss and quickly deepened into a plum--very unexpected!  I like it just fine, but I expected a bit more color fidelity.

reviews.review_title: new fave, stays on me at all times.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi! i got this product as a gift and I had no idea what to expect from it. It applies so nicely and its not thick so i can spread it evenly! there is also no smell, so it feels easy to have it on. would highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Nice texture & longevity for a lip oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staining lip oil, not a gloss. Having tried other lip oils, this has a really nice texture and surprisingly longevity given its an oil stain. Lasted for about 3 hours through drinking coffee before I has fo reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There aren't enough pictures of Tamarind so I've included a couple of how it wore on me throughout the day. Color: I was hoping for a rich brown but 1 layer on me was initially just a bit deeper than my natural lip color. It's actually very close to the color on the packaging, just more translucent. The longer it stayed on my lips the rosier and deeper the color seemed to be, which might be due to the staining. Texture: Thin but durable. It's not goopy but still feels like something substantial is on my lips. That said, I wouldn't rely on this to be the sole moisture for my lips.  Stain: After the gloss has worn down (took about 2.5 hours after some light snacking and sips of water) I do see some staining and it lasts a while. In person, compared to the photo, the stain color is deeper. More mahogany. Overall, I liked this product but would probably prefer it in a different (i.e. deeper) color. Tamarind is lovely but because on me it's so close to a nude, I'd rather have a similar color in a more substantial/nourishing texture. I think this color would be nice on fairer skintones if you're going for a modestly vampy look, and would be great for someone around my skintone looking for a rosy nude.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't hydrate my dry lips and it's very watery. no more than a lip tint. Returning it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lip oil/stains! They are hydrating, lightweight, pigmented, and last pretty long. The only time I feel I need to reapply is after eating a full meal.  I bought First Sari, Caramel, Tamarind, and Black Cherry and have been enjoying experimenting with them. If youre thinking about trying these, just go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product is what it claims: hydrating, true to color shown, and leaves a stain. However, the stain isnt long lasting and fades quickly within an hour. It tends to smell a bit after 1 month. I also noticed products staining ability decreased the longer I had the product, I bought it back in July and Im almost out of the product which is alarmingly fast. I checked the product amount in this which is only a measly 0.14 oz/barely 4 mL?! For reference, the new summer fridays lip balm mini sets each have 5 g of product in each MINI lip balm, and the tower 28 new mini sets also each have 5g. Each of those sets cost $25 and $20 respectively for a total of 20g, and the kulfi lip oil costs $24 for 4g. You do the math, this is a decent and nice product but an absolute robbery and the brand should be held accountable for giving such a ridiculously minuscule amount of product at this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its more of a lip gloss and not a lip stain, no pigment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it just doesnt last. Its so pretty when it first goes on but I find myself having to reapply it every few hours. It does not leave a stain on my lips whatsoever. I made sure my lips were exfoliated and moisturized prior to application. I was really hoping the nice rose color would last after the gloss wears off like it says it will, but it definitely does not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i dont normally write reviews but had to about this. BEST LIP OIL EVER. it feels comfortable on the lips and the color is beautiful. if youre going to buy anything from this brand, let it be this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: nice hydrating lip stain, with great color choices for brown skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: as someone who doesn't like reapplying their lippies all day and not a huge fan of lipsticks, a lip stain is pretty much what I'm looking for and this thing delivers. gorgeous flattering colour that leaves a long lasting stain, so I can eat and drink as much as I want without worrying about the colour coming off. still have to reapply now and then if I feel like the colour isn't dark enough anymore, but still such a good product and will be repurchasing when I run out, and may even buy more shades (when I have the money to do so ud83dude1eud83dude1e)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I probably have a million other lip products in this same color family lol I am a creature of habit. I was able to snag the last one in store! The texture reminds me of the Rare Beauty lip oils (which are really a stain) and they are both made in Korea. Similarly this applies a little lighter than when it settles. I didnt notice too much of a stain with this shade since its quite close to my natural lip but looking forward to trying one of the darker colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I AM ABSOLUTELY OBSESSED WITH THIS LIP PRODUCT!! This triples as a lip stain, oil, gloss,etc..  I love it so much and the shade is just devine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its fragrance free and this is the first time Im gravitated towards these shades. Its very light weight as if you have nothing on the lips but it is an oil. I was hoping for more purple.  The color is pretty represented by the packaging   Not messy. Doesnt bleed outside of the lips without lipliner.

reviews.review_title: One of the best lip stains
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As an employee, I saw so many people return Tamarind. I had to try it and well I love it SO MUCH. For my goth girlies: I think youll like this one :) its a fairly dark reddish brown that leaves a pretty mauve stain. It doesnt dry out my lips and the color lasts nearly all day. I DO recommend!

reviews.review_title: Don't waste your money, not long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Is it a lovely color and moisturizing? yes, is it long lasting? Not at all, extremely disappointed especially because of the cost. Save your money and get one of the K beauty brands lipstains instead they are much better.

reviews.review_title: Came back to get the Black Cherry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using lip stains and prefer them over any other type of product. After using the Caramel shade, I decided to come back and order the Black Cherry because I love the formula so much. I had to wear a mask for work and this lip stain did not come off at all. That's how good it stays on. I wish there were more colors, like a good pinky-peachy nude.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping for a lip stain since that is what is in the title. this did not stain my lips nor did it last long. I got berry hoping it would stain but it did nothing for me. it's just a thin oil with a little color that feels good, if that's what you are looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the rose and caramel, absolutely LOVEDD the way it looked, unfortunately after a week of using them they got this horrible grabage/fish/spoiled smell, it must have been the heat, soo disappointed because I really loved them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves an impressive stain. Its like transfer proof lip gloss. Ive tried many stains, and this is my fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm quite satisfied with the color pay off from Tamarind; it's giving pigment and leaves a nice color once the color transfers on the lips. It's budge proof and you can reapply without it looking caked. It feels like a lip gloss and I love the applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the color but after a few hours my lips felt burnt and dry. Definitely allergic to something in this lip oil. My lips are red and burning still and I washed the oil off 10 hours ago.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip stain so far. The color rose comes on light at first and then darkens a bit as time passes. Super glossy and smooth. I over lined my lips a bit with this lip stain and after I waited 1-2 hours wiped the gloss off (I personally dont like super shiny lips) I saw the beautiful stain afterwards. Its a soft, lip bitten look that I wanted. Ill see if it lasts against oily foods I eat through out the day. So far it seems to be stubborn. Remember to exfoliate your lips otherwise the lip stain will become extra pigmented in areas of your skin that have the extra lip skin shedding thats still hanging there. Against my skin and lip color, the color appears as a slightly warm soft dusty rose shade. It looks more cool toned in my room with the lights off. Looks warm in daylight by the window. Pigment that intensified where I had the lip skin shedding became a little reddish. I recommend this lip stain to others. Very pretty! Im happy I dont have to reach for my lip liner and reapply over the course of the day.

reviews.review_title: Takes a system to make it work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
